content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_projectDB;

select top 100 *
    from OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_delta/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'Delta'

    )as result_set

*******************************************************************************************************************************

select top 100 *
    from OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_delta/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data',
        FORMAT = 'Delta'

    )with (
    store_and_fwd_flag char(1) ,
    VendorID int,
    lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(7),
    lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(7),
    total_amount FLOAT,
    payment_type INT,
    trip_type INT,
    year VARCHAR(5),
    month VARCHAR(3)
        ) 
as result_set

*******************************************************************************************************************************

select top 100 *
    from OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'raw/trip_data_green_delta/',
        DATA_SOURCE = 'nyc_taxi_data', FORMAT = 'Delta'
    )with (
    store_and_fwd_flag char(1) ,VendorID int,lpep_pickup_datetime datetime2(7),lpep_dropoff_datetime datetime2(7),
    total_amount FLOAT,payment_type INT,trip_type INT,
    year VARCHAR(5),
    month VARCHAR(3) ) as result_set
        where year = '2020' and month = '07';
